#!/bin/ash
# Purpur Installation Script v4 - Full Private & Public Plugin Deployment

# --- Log Start ---
echo "INFO: Starting advanced server installation..."

# --- Preamble: Install necessary tools ---
# Added 'git' for cloning private repositories
apk add --no-cache curl jq git

# --- Step 1: Download the Purpur Server JAR ---
PROJECT=purpur
echo "INFO: Determining latest Purpur version..."
# Using your existing logic to get the correct Purpur JAR
if [ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
    echo -e "INFO: Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=`eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g')`
else
    VER_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/${PROJECT} | jq -r --arg VERSION $MINECRAFT_VERSION '.versions[] | contains($VERSION)' | grep true`
    LATEST_VERSION=`curl -s https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/${PROJECT} | jq -r '.versions' | jq -r '.[-1]'`
    if [ "${VER_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
        MINECRAFT_VERSION=${MINECRAFT_VERSION}
    else
        MINECRAFT_VERSION=${LATEST_VERSION}
    fi
    BUILD_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/${PROJECT}/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r --arg BUILD ${BUILD_NUMBER} '.builds.all | tostring | contains($BUILD)' | grep true`
    LATEST_BUILD=`curl -s https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/${PROJECT}/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds.latest'`
    if [ "${BUILD_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
        BUILD_NUMBER=${BUILD_NUMBER}
    else
        BUILD_NUMBER=${LATEST_BUILD}
    fi
    JAR_NAME=${PROJECT}-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar
    DOWNLOAD_URL=https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/${PROJECT}/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/${BUILD_NUMBER}/download
fi
echo "INFO: Downloading Purpur from ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
curl -L -o /mnt/server/${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}

# --- Step 2: Download Server Properties if Needed ---
if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    echo -e "Downloading MC server.properties"
    curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kylegroves6/Pelican-Egg-Configs/refs/heads/main/Eggs/Minecraft/Purpur/Purpur-for-Velocity/server.properties
fi

# --- Step 3: Clear Old Plugins & Prepare Directory ---
echo "INFO: Clearing old plugin JARs to ensure a clean installation..."
mkdir -p /mnt/server/plugins
rm -f /mnt/server/plugins/*.jar

# --- Step 4: Install Private Plugins from Secure Git Repo ---
PRIVATE_REPO="Pelican-Private-Files" # <-- ‼️ CHANGE THIS if your private repo has a different name
echo "INFO: Cloning premium plugins from private repository..."
# Uses the secure variables you created in the egg
git clone https://${GITHUB_USER}:${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/${GITHUB_USER}/Pelican-Private-Files.git /tmp/private_repo
mkdir -p "/tmp/private_shared_plugins"
cp -R "/tmp/private_repo/QNS Minecraft Server Network Files/Private Plugins/shared_plugins"* "/tmp/private_shared_plugins"
if [ -d "/tmp/private_shared_plugins" ] && [ -n "$(ls -A /tmp/private_shared_plugins/*.jar 2>/dev/null)" ]; then
    echo "INFO: Copying premium plugins into place..."
    cp /tmp/private_shared_plugins/*.jar /mnt/server/plugins/
else
    echo "WARNING: No premium plugins found in private repository to copy."
fi

# --- Step 4.1: Install Server-Specific Private Plugins ---
PRIVATE_SERVER_PATH="/tmp/private_repo/QNS Minecraft Server Network Files/Private Plugins/${NETWORK_SERVER}"
if [ -d "$PRIVATE_SERVER_PATH" ] && [ -n "$(ls -A "$PRIVATE_SERVER_PATH/"*.jar 2>/dev/null)" ]; then
    echo "INFO: Copying server-specific premium plugins for ${NETWORK_SERVER}..."
    cp "$PRIVATE_SERVER_PATH/"*.jar /mnt/server/plugins/
else
    echo "INFO: No server-specific premium plugins found for ${NETWORK_SERVER}."
fi

# --- Step 4.2: Clean up Private Plugin Install ---
rm -rf /tmp/private_repo # Clean up the temporary repo clone
rm -rf /tmp/private_shared_plugins # Clean up the temporary plugin clone

# --- Step 5: Download and Process Public Plugin Manifest ---
MANIFEST_URL="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kylegroves6/Pelican-Egg-Configs/main/Eggs/Minecraft/Purpur/Purpur-for-Velocity/network-server-plugins.json" # <-- ‼️ VERIFY THIS URL is correct
echo "INFO: Downloading public plugin manifest..."
curl -s -o /tmp/manifest.json ${MANIFEST_URL}

# --- Step 5.1: Install Shared Public Plugins ---
cd /mnt/server/plugins
# Reads name, url, and source. Uses '%' as a safe delimiter.
echo "INFO: Installing shared public plugins from manifest..."
jq -r '.shared_plugins[][] | "\(.name)%\(.url)%\(.source)"' /tmp/manifest.json | while IFS='%' read -r name url source; do
    if [[ "$source" == "private" ]]; then
        echo "Skipping ${name} (private plugin, already installed)..."
    else
        echo "Downloading Shared Plugin: ${name}..."
        max_retries=3
        retry_count=0
        while [ $retry_count -lt $max_retries ]; do
            if curl -L -o "${name}.jar" "${url}"; then
                break  # Success, exit retry loop
            fi
            retry_count=$((retry_count+1))
            if [ $retry_count -lt $max_retries ]; then
                echo "Retrying ${name} (attempt ${retry_count}/${max_retries})..."
                sleep 2
            fi
        done
        if [ ! -f "${name}.jar" ]; then
            echo "ERROR: Failed to download plugin: ${name} from ${url} after ${max_retries} attempts"
            rm -f "${name}.jar"
        else
            # Optional: Validate JAR
            if ! file "${name}.jar" | grep -q "Java archive"; then
                echo "ERROR: ${name}.jar is not a valid JAR file"
                rm -f "${name}.jar"
            fi
        fi
    fi
done

# --- Step 5.2: Install Server-Specific Public Plugins ---
echo "INFO: Installing server-specific plugins for type: ${NETWORK_SERVER}..."
jq -r --argjson group "\"${NETWORK_SERVER}\"" '.server_groups[$group][][] | "\(.name)%\(.url)%\(.source)"' /tmp/manifest.json | while IFS='%' read -r name url source; do
    if [[ "$source" == "private" ]]; then
        echo "Skipping ${name} (private plugin, already installed)..."
    else
        echo "Downloading ${NETWORK_SERVER} Plugin: ${name}..."
        max_retries=3
        retry_count=0
        while ! curl -L -o "${name}.jar" "${url}" && [ $retry_count -lt $max_retries ]; do
            retry_count=$((retry_count+1))
            echo "Retrying ${name} (attempt ${retry_count}/${max_retries})..."
            sleep 2
        done
        if [ ! -f "${name}.jar" ]; then
            echo "ERROR: Failed to download plugin: ${name} after ${max_retries} attempts"
        fi
        # Optional: Validate JAR file
        if [ -f "${name}.jar" ] && ! file "${name}.jar" | grep -q "Java archive"; then
            echo "ERROR: ${name}.jar is not a valid JAR file"
            rm -f "${name}.jar"
        fi
    fi
done

echo "SUCCESS: Server and plugin installation is complete."
